VRChat Speech Assistant
  • vrchat_speech_assistant
  • View page source

vrchat_speech_assistantÔÉÅ

vrchat_speech_assistant.main ModuleÔÉÅ

The VRChat Speech Assistant allows you to easily use a speech to speech, with automatic translation.

And / or speech to text with the VRChat chatbox using OSC protocol.

ClassesÔÉÅ

BlockingOSCUDPServer(server_address,¬†dispatcher)

Blocking version of the UDP server.

ConfigDialog(parent)

A dialog that allows the user to configure the VRC Speech Assistant application.

Dispatcher()

Maps Handlers to OSC addresses and dispatches messages to the handler on matched addresses

Logger([name,¬†level,¬†log_file])

The Logger class provides logging functionality with different log levels.

Path(*args,¬†**kwargs)

PurePath subclass that can make system calls.

Polly(aws_access_key_id,¬†...)

Use Amazon Polly API to synthesize a speech.

Qt

SimpleUDPClient(address,¬†port[,¬†...])

Simple OSC client that automatically builds OscMessage from arguments

Thread([group,¬†target,¬†name,¬†args,¬†kwargs,¬†...])

A class that represents a thread of control.

VRCSpeechAssistantWindow()

The main window of the VRC Speech Assistant application.

VariablesÔÉÅ

CONFIG_FILE

Path subclass for Windows systems.

DEEPL

dict() -> new empty dictionary dict(mapping) -> new dictionary initialized from a mapping object's (key, value) pairs dict(iterable) -> new dictionary initialized as if via: d = {} for k, v in iterable: d[k] = v dict(**kwargs) -> new dictionary initialized with the name=value pairs in the keyword argument list. For example: dict(one=1, two=2).

For example: dict(one=1, two=2).

For example: dict(one=1, two=2).
